data.text: @EU_Commission @EU_Regional Corruption galore

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU So long as there will be many governments and national interests there will be so many divisions and quarrels. Therefore the EU in the 21st century should create UNITED STATES OF EUROPE as USA - one common government, one country, many nations, common currency. Good luck❤️🇪🇺

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU Like they decided to vote for an anti-EU government that was then blocked by your stooge in Rome, and all because they didn’t support your project. Yay for EU-style “democracy”.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Worried about Italy exit Mr J.

@EU_Commission Stop

Just stop all together
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU the economy of Italy, Spain and Greece is shit

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU So? Even a founding member can realize that whatever they helped create decades ago has changed so much, it no longer fits their views/needs/interests and decide there is no chance to change that, because any critic of the system gets hammered by the EU-centralists and the media.
@EU_Commission You are allowing an member state to imprison politicians for their ideas. Do u really have the nerve to ask where u should focus? Shame on u.
@EU_Commission Publishing a set of independently audited accounts

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Is president Juncker familiar with that tale of yore concerning King Canute and the tides. The good kings courtiers told him that he was so powerful that even the tides would obey him. The tides didn't. Despite M Barnier's best efforts  the bond market will do its thing.

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU yes,but i am tired and sick of seeing
to often the danger where the EU is been put in bycaus the EU is waiting
for to long time to make the needed
reforms 😕
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Then fire Oettinger

@EU_Commission An undemocratic body that sees its role to increase 'efficiency'! Democracy is the only way to ensure the greatest happiness to the greatest number. (Because no one can judge who's voice should be stronger.)  Economics is the study of possible ways to achieve the voters' will.
@EU_Commission whom may I contact for clarification regarding delayed travel compensation under EU regulation 261/2004?
@EU_Commission @EU_Regional And that is exactly why I voted to leave the eu - I am NOT a socialist !
@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU And here's hoping they have an anti eu government !
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU yes,but not the Italian politic
@EU_Commission Bit bloody late now. If you had done this after the Bloomberg Speech we might all be working together on this.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU we certainly don't need #junker to say #Italy deserve respect, a poor statement by an embarassing man much alike #Oettinger
@EU_Commission @adamfleming @MargSchinas @JunckerEU We stopped believing you long ago. Oettinger let the truth slip, your clumsy attempts to brush it under the carpet fool nobody

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU Like Greeks? You are destroying our lives, you are stealing our dreams and our future. This is not the Europe we want: Europe should mean cooperation, not annexation.

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU But some capital controls, until they decide the right thing, won’t hurt anyone, right? Hmmm, sorry, on second thought, #Italy is too big and you cannot afford smashing it like a cockroach as you did with #Greece! #hypocrisy #Oettinger

@EU_Commission #EfficientEU Focus:Building stronger relations with United States, improving relations with Russia, staying United, improving external border protections, innovation, customer rights, liberty. Stop: Inefficient approach/fund waste to climate change agenda, protecting lower values

@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Paura eh(!) che la sabbia che ha sotto i piedi la inghiotta.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU LIAR.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Your budget commissioner @GOettingerEU disagrees. Until he resigns or is fired, I would see his statement as an equal position by the #EU.
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Dismiss #Oettinger and prepare for #Italexit
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Meritiamo si rispetto e come paese fondatore dell’Ue, dobbiamo rispettare le regole che ci siamo dati. 🇮🇹🇪🇺
@EU_Commission @JunckerEU Wrong! An asymmetrical warfare directed toward the country default. Where are the EU countermeasures against a such attack?
@EU_Commission @EU_Regional cohesian policy? is that the policy which put greeks into eternal debtors jail in order to reimburse french and german gambling losses?

@EU_Commission Please give expats Europe citizenships for their few remaining years.

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU yes, unlike the polish or hungarians

Eastern Europe needs EU now!

@EU_Commission @jyrkikatainen @CorinaCretuEU Dear Commissioners, ETR is appealing and calling to save funds for budgeting them to include @MeGovernment & @MFA_Macedonia in MFF 2020 full member. it is not major budget item and both are ready for membership. Why loose a decade?

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU you are part of the EU and if you think you can for ever live on the money of the EU, than fuc you.
you better should inform the Italian people in an honest way and not by misleading them or fouling

@EU_Commission @jyrkikatainen @CorinaCretuEU Dear Commissioners, ETR is congratulating you for saving on Central Europe - it is now rich. But as well southern Europe need not more European transfers but lower tax rates first of all. And market based reforms and in case of Southern Italy more infrastructure funding access.
@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU poorly managed by Italy, Spain and Greece. We will pay. And they do not do anything. They live on debt

@EU_Commission Why does not Mr. Juncker suggest to hold dialog  with the new president of the Catalan government? With the legally elected president of Catalonia? Especially since there is a deep crisis in the government of Spain? Corruption crisis.

@EU_Commission Why does the EU keep silent when in Spain for half a year the Catalan politicians are in prison? Just because they gave people the right to vote? Does the EU not agree with the UN Charter and its declarations on the right of peoples to self-determination?
@EU_Commission @EU_Regional #CohesionPolicy mi sembra un'ottima intuizione, soprattutto oggi
@EU_Commission kill yourselves

@EU_Commission Nature first,  Stop Monsanto  focus

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU Stop talking about us and do something for the Europe! Like this, Europe is going to explode, and you all are responsible for that!

@EU_Commission @MargSchinas @JunckerEU Hope it will be enough. But not that sure. Better if @GOettingerEU excuse himself directly.

@EU_Commission The EU is not any different from any ...ism fasism, nazism, communism,  liberalism. I as a citizen want to vote for the EU commissioner and all the EU leaders just like it is in the USA. EU want to rull the life of the EU nations by force.
